thread.title: Goldman Sachs in Talks With Apple to Finance iPhone Sales

author: Peter Rudegeair
title: Goldman Sachs in Talks With Apple to Finance iPhone Sales
text:
As Apple Inc.’s investment bank, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. has raised tens of billions of dollars for the technology company. Now, Goldman wants to bank Apple’s customers, too—with a ticket size of a few hundred dollars at a time.

The Wall Street firm is in talks to offer financing to shoppers buying phones, watches and other gadgets from Apple, people familiar with the matter said. Customers purchasing a $1,000 iPhone X could take out a loan from Goldman instead of charging it to credit cards that often carry high interest...
